phrases: The Dark Guild with only 6 members, Oracion Seis!
In order to put them down, the official guilds have formed an alliance!
And even Ichiya, who I cannot handle!
If it is love and dreams and you it will become magical.
Now, let us cast a smile spell!
I kind of admired this powerful world,
Frozen time has started to move again
I do not need any complicated answers.
Simple feelings are the most important.
You can change those tears she would on sad nights into strength.
Now, let us cast a smile spell!
How crazy dangerous is this guy?
I am Wendy Marvel, from Caitshelter.
It is nice to meet you all.
And now, all four guilds have gathered.
You are just going to continue on?
Sending this one little girl for such a big mission?
She is not alone, Miss Too-Much-Makeup.
I would be far too worried with you going alone.
Would you give her this fish of mine?
Wait, is this love at first sight?
You have to make your move yourself or it will not work.
And you are rolling your tongue 3 times more!
But I can use a lot of magic that can help support you.
So please do not leave me out!
It is because you are always so weak-kneed that people look down on you!
I am saying not to apologize so quickly!
I was a bit taken aback at first, but it was not my intention.
I am glad to have you with us, Wendy.
She is a better woman than I thought she would be.
Looks more like she blew you off, but whatever.
You cannot understand a woman's heart.
Uh... I do happen to be a woman, though...
That girl is going to grow into a real babe.
I think she is plenty cute already.
How could I describe this girl's parfum?
It is not something you smell every day.
Her magical power is something different than ours.
It looks like Erza-dono has also noticed.
Would you like some orange juice?
Seriously, you are just too cute.
What is with these men in heat?
I know I have heard that name before, I think...
You should not go smiling to random guys like that.
T-That is not what I was...
What kind of guys do you like?
Will not you have some cake?
I mean, seriously, you are too damn cute.
I said, we did not come here to play around!
They changed what they call him again...
You almost have to admire their inconsistency...
As it seems we are all here, I will go ahead and explain the plan.
Is that pose of yours really necessary?
I will start with the place where the Six Wizard Generals, Oracion Seis, are gathering...
But first, I will inspect the bathroom's parfum.
Hey, do not go smelling up the toilet!
The Worth Woodsea spreads out from here to the north.
Ancient people sealed an extremely power magic spell inside the woodsea.
Look, we really do not need the posing.
I have never heard of it.
And do you want a fish?
It is destruction magic powerful enough for the ancients to seal.
That is basically all we know.
We do not know what kind of magic it is.
I do not like the sound of that...
The reason that Oracion Seis has gathered in the woodsea
must be to get their hands on Nirvana.
And in order for us to stop them...
And there they go posing again...
I am not even going to say anything anymore.
Those six are all incredibly powerful.
I have never seen it before.
These are videos of them we finally obtained recently.
The wizard who uses poisonous snakes...
Ooh, he looks like a real bad guy!
You are eyes are the same!
Thought to use speed magic, like his name implies...
I think this is a case of hate at first sight.
He is a wizard that can even wipe out an entire military unit, and will if there is profit in it...
Hot Eye of the Heavenly Eye!
The woman said to peer into your heart...
I think I might be naturally weak against someone like that.
We do not have much information about this guy, but he is called Midnight.
That name does not bode well.
Then, the control center for them all... Brain.
Each of them holds magical power great enough to destroy an entire guild.
That is why we will use our numbers to our advantage.
I think it might be best if you did not count me...
I am also not very good at fighting!
Our plan does not simply involve fighting.
All we have to do is find their base of operations.
We have not mentioned it yet.
We conjecture that they have a temporary base somewhere in the woodsea.
If it is possible, I would want us to get them all into their base.
So that means fighting, of course.
What will we do when they are all there?
We will use our guild's pride and joy, Christina, the Pegasus,
and together with it, wipe the base off the face of the planet!
So it is like a magical bomber?
We would use that kind of thing against people?
That is just how powerful they are!
If we get in battle, do not fight alone under any circumstances!
Make sure to have at least two of us for every one of them we face!
I will take all six of'them on at once!
I know he is impatient, but seriously...
I do not think he even listened to the plan.
We cannot let Fairy Tail get all the good bits.
Well, it looks like the operation has started.
I have heard that you are one of the Ten Great Wizard Saints...
And you are powerful enough to rival even Master Makarov?
The title of Wizard Saint is bestowed by the Council.
I am the weakest of them all.
We may have the same title, but compared to Master Makarov,
it is like the difference between Heaven and Earth.
That is quite a relief to hear.
If you were really as powerful as Makarov, I would have been somewhat at a loss.
A magical parfum that saps one's fighting spirit.
What is the meaning of this?
And furthermore, this is a scent that simulates every sensation of pain
That Ichiya fellow only ever thought about pervy stuff.
Oh, I just copied that dirty little man.
And thanks to that, I know your entire plan!
We can tell what the people...
I have gotten rid of two already.
Do not get in our way, children of the light.
Naughty children who get in our way will face Angel's judgment.
Do not go running off ahead of us!
Cannot stand the thought of me taking the lead?
He has not changed much, has he?
When I think that I once fought with him, it is really quite complicated.
Should I give you a princess carry?
I am doing my best, too!
I do not really get it, but there is something odd in the air.
Do not let your guard down, Sherry!
What took you so long, people?
You must have a durable body to go along with that thick skull of yours...
What the hell are you doing?
Do not just stop like that!
That is the Pegasus I have heard about?
Let us split up and search for their base.
We already got Jura and Ichiya!
We should hurry up with our work.
But you are getting in our way.
Let me tell you something nice.
Money is everything in this world, and...
I think one of them is asleep...
I did not expect them to show themselves to us.
Now we do not have to go find you!
Even without love, as long as you have money, yes!
He is so fast, I cannot see!
He read and dodged that many swords?
Why are you sleeping, you bastard?!
But I can hear it, Titania...
I knew it, he is predicting me...
I told you, I can hear you.
Midnight's real scary when he wakes up.
Money is more powerful than love, yes!
The contraction and expansion of your muscles...
Cobra, what are you waiting for?
Cubelios's poison does not take effect immediately.
It let us you live for a while in pain!
Trash, you should all vanish from this earth.
Why did you stop the spell?
Seis is just too powerful, wiping us all out like that!
I are not been wiped out yet.
I are not lost'till I say I lost!
It is time to get my revenge!
If it follows your usual revenge pattern, you will be beaten to a pulp!
And when have I ever been beaten to a pulp by the same guy twice?
Do not look back, I always say!
In your case, that is not really a good thing...
